list.historyEntry: Explain: FATAL EXCEPTION: main Process: com.august.gateman, PID: 8595 java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to create application com.aaecosystem.luna.Luna: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke interface method 'void com.aaecosystem.luna.crashlytics.CrashlyticsHelper.setEnable(boolean)' on a null object reference at android.app.ActivityThread.handleBindApplication(ActivityThread.java:7312) at android.app.ActivityThread.-$$Nest$mhandleBindApplication(Unknown Source:0) with tag AndroidRuntime
I'm using dagger, and I'm injecting to a companion object
How to replace FirebaseCrashlytics.getInstance().recordException(exception) with DI injected CrashlyticsHelper?
Make attributes: Map<String, Any?>? to a bundle
AndroidApplicationGoogleServiceConventionPlugin to apply plugin according to flavor
